name: BurpingContest
0:
”Alexa, ask Burping Contest for a contest between Guy and Karen”
”Alexa, open Burping Contest”
”Alexa, tell burping contest to have a contest with Guy and Karen”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: burping contest
des:
Challenge your friends to a burping contest with Alexa. 

Ask Alexa for a burping contest by saying "Alexa, ask Burping Contest for a contest between Guy and Karen." Alexa will then start the burping contest and a winner will be chosen. You can also start a contest by asking Alexa to open Burping Contest, and then give her the names of the contestants when prompted.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
